data.text:
As Ridgley Volunteer Fire Company continues to modernize, the need for improvement is critical. That’s why I was proud to have secured CDS funding that will support the construction of a new fire station to replace their current 54-year old facility.
 
@WVNews247 has more about

Wishing a happy 25th Birthday to our very own @WVNationalGuard Staff Sgt. Andrew Wolfe. We are extremely grateful for your bravery and dedication to West Virginia and our Country, and West Virginia continues to pray for your full recovery!

I fully support our ICE officials and their mission to enforce our immigration laws. Our law enforcement officers should be able to do their jobs safely without fear or intimidation. https://t.co/OzCbdt1rft

As Berkeley County continues to grow and develop, the need for additional clean water infrastructure is critical. That’s why I was proud to secure CDS funding that will support existing water needs and future growth to bring additional business, residential, and recreational

Alzheimer’s and Dementia affect millions of families. As the daughter of parents impacted by this disease, improving funding for research and supporting primary care providers is important to me. With alarming Alzheimer’s statistics growing, action at the disease’s earliest https://t.co/klz0YLkSn7

This is a great example of how cooperation WORKS! Thank you to the brave men and women of @ICEgov and West Virginia law enforcement on the execution of a swift and successful operation. Our communities are safer because of you! https://t.co/lFEWuH5rVR
